parsed.internal_thinking: I've placed my first settlement on node 20, which gives me excellent access to Brick (6), Sheep (8), and some Wood (11). Now I need to decide the direction of my road. Analyzing the neighbors of node 20 (10, 19, and 21), node 10 stands out. It leads toward node 11 (high pips) and node 9 (a 3:1 port), which will be crucial for trading my surplus resources later. The path toward 19 is decent but has lower pip density, and 21 leads toward the desert. Therefore, building toward 10 is the strongest strategic move. [Response was too brief]
parsed.note_to_self: I am prioritizing the path toward the 3:1 port at node 9 and the high-yield node 11.
parsed.say_outloud: going to point my road towards the top, looks like some good spots to expand into later.
